meta.title: Operation of Laboratory Sink with Eye Wash

sections.purpose: To facilitate glassware cleaning and provide emergency eye decontamination.
sections.scope: Applicable to general maintenance and safety in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Use the faucet for cleaning glassware with non-hazardous residues.
Keep the sink basin free from clutter and solid waste.
In an emergency, activate the eye wash by pushing the lever.
Rinse eyes for at least 15 minutes as per safety protocols.
Flush the eye wash station weekly to ensure water quality.
Clean the sink strainer regularly to prevent clogging.
Keep the surrounding floor dry to prevent slips and falls.
precautions: Do not pour hazardous chemical waste down the sink.
Ensure the eye wash heads are protected by dust covers.
Maintain clear access to the emergency eye wash at all times.
Wear gloves when cleaning the sink with detergents.
Report any plumbing leaks or low water pressure.
